name: RandoMining
description:
Join a Robotic Underground Treasure Hunter (or R.U.T.H. if you prefer) as she navigates her way through dangerous randomly-populated subterranean environments to procure precious gems and acquire valuable wildlife specimens to replace the cargo she, uh, accidentally hit the 'teleport inside a nearby asteroid' button on. Whoops!

An arcade-style game for players who like their action a little more on the relaxed side (though still nonetheless challenging), RandoMining is perfect for quick play sessions or extended score-hunting marathons alike; and with every time being different there are going to be some experiences to be had indeed!
